attributes.title: Male prostitute
attributes.actor: Dennis StokesA '''male prostitute''' is an unnamed recurring character in the Season 2

sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
He helps [[Ros]] to train a new prostitute named [[Marei]] by sleeping with her.<ref>"[[The North Remembers]]"</ref> He sleeps with Marei again for the enjoyment of a voyeuristic customer.<ref>"[[The Night Lands]]"</ref>
